doc.previous: According to a New York Times article titled Signaling Post Snowden Era New iPhone Locks Out N S A Apple has developed a new encryption method for iOS 8 described as so deep that Apple could no longer comply with government warrants asking for customer information to be extracted from devices 333
doc.after: Apple tightly controls certain aspects of the iPhone According to Jonathan Zittrain the emergence of closed devices like the iPhone have made computing more proprietary than early versions of Microsoft Windows 334
